text: Keiten'notami no ōku wa, anata gataga shinkō o ukeireta nochi demo, fushinjin ni modosou to nozonde iru. Shinri ga kare-ra ni akiraka ni sa rete iru ni mo kakawarazu, jibunjishin'no shittoshinkara kō nozomu nodearu. Dakara arrā no meirei ga kudaru made, kare-ra o yurushi, minoga ga shite oki nasai. Hontōni arrā wa subete no koto ni zen'nō de ara reru
